CustomField.formula:
IF(
(TEXT(NokiaCPQ_State__c) = 'Obsolete' || TEXT(NokiaCPQ_State__c) = 'Rejected'), false,
IF(
(PMD_Portfolio_Classification__c = 'SW' || PMD_Portfolio_Classification__c = 'SW Modules' || PMD_Additional_Classification__c = 'Product Variant'),
true,
(CONTAINS(DataUsage__c, 'CARES') || CONTAINS(DataUsage__c, 'SF Case Handling') || NCP_CAREACTIVATE__c <> null)
))
CustomField.label: CH Valid
